title: "Google Releases TensorFlow API To Develop Smaller & Faster ML Models"
excerpt: "The TensorFlow Model Optimization team from Google recently released Quantization Aware Training (QAT) API as part of the TensorFlow Model Optimization Toolkit. According to the team, the API will enable training and deploying machine learning models with improved performance; these would be compact despite maintaining maximum accuracy."
